languages.text: "В системе Фурибундус расположен {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} — форпост Империума с единственной исправной верфью в Просторе Коронус. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрецы{/g} молят о том, чтобы вы смилостивились над измученными варпом машинами и позволили служителям Омниссии осмотреть и исцелить раны судна в доке. Молитвы и ритуалы займут время, которые наш {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатический{/g} хор использует для налаживания связи с основными мирами вашего протектората — Даргонусом, Янусом и Кьявой Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "В системе Фурибундус расположен {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} — форпост Империума с единственной исправной верфью в Просторе Коронус. Техножрецы молят о том, чтобы вы смилостивились над измученными варпом машинами и поставили судно в док на ремонт. Молитвы и ритуалы займут несколько дней, которые наш {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатический{/g} хор использует для налаживания связи с основными мирами вашей торговой империи — Даргонусом, Янусом и Кьявой Гаммой".

languages.text: "The Furibundus System is home to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the warp and to allow the servants of the Omnissiah to inspect and heal the voidship's wounds in the dock. The prayers and rituals will take some time, which our {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} Choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your protectorate — Dargonus, Janus, and Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "В системе Фурибундус расположен {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} — форпост Империума с единственной исправной верфью в Просторе Коронус. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрецы{/g} молят о том, чтобы вы смилостивились над измученными варпом машинами и позволили служителям Омниссии осмотреть и исцелить раны судна в доке. Молитвы и ритуалы займут время, которые наш {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатический{/g} хор использует для налаживания связи с основными мирами вашего протектората — Даргонусом, Янусом и Кьявой Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "The Furibundus system houses Footfall — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The tech-priests are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the Warp and dock the vessel for repairs. The prayers and rituals will take a few days that our astropathic choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your merchant empire — Dargonus, Janus and Kiava Gamma."

"The Furibundus system houses Footfall — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The tech-priests are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the Warp and dock the vessel for repairs. The prayers and rituals will take a few days that our astropathic choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your merchant empire — Dargonus, Janus and Kiava Gamma."

The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the warp and to allow the servants of the Omnissiah to inspect and heal the voidship's wounds in the dock. The prayers and rituals will take some time, which our {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} Choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your protectorate — Dargonus, Janus, and Kiava Gamma."

languages.text: «El sistema Furibundus es donde se encuentra {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, el único puesto avanzado del Imperium con un puerto funcional en la Extensión de Koronus. Los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} ruegan que tenga compasión con las máquinas desgastadas por la disformidad y que permita que los siervos del Omnissiah inspeccionen y traten las heridas de la nave del vacío en el muelle. Sus plegarias y rituales tardarán un tiempo, durante el que nuestro Coro de {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astrópatas{/g} establecerá contacto con los mundos centrales de su protectorado: Dargonus, Janus y Kiava Gamma».
languages.original_text: "The Furibundus System is home to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the warp and to allow the servants of the Omnissiah to inspect and heal the voidship's wounds in the dock. The prayers and rituals will take some time, which our {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} Choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your protectorate — Dargonus, Janus, and Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: «El sistema Furibundus es donde se encuentra {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, el único puesto avanzado del Imperium con un puerto funcional en la Extensión de Koronus. Los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} ruegan que tenga compasión con las máquinas desgastadas por la disformidad y que permita que los siervos del Omnissiah traten las heridas de la nave del vacío en el muelle. Sus plegarias y rituales tardarán unos días, durante los que nuestro Coro de {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astrópatas{/g} establecerá contacto con los mundos centrales de su protectorado: Dargonus, Janus y Kiava Gamma».

languages.text: “怒焰星系是{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的所在地。这里是整个科罗努斯扩区中，帝国唯一还在正常运转的前哨站。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}恳请您怜悯那些在亚空间中遭到损耗的机器，希望您允许欧姆尼塞亚的仆人在这里检查、治疗虚空舰的伤口。他们的祈祷仪式需要花些时间。在这段时间里，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语唱诗班{/g}会负责联系您麾下的主要世界：达戈努斯、加努斯，以及基亚瓦伽马星，与这些世界之间建立联系。”
languages.original_text: "The Furibundus System is home to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the warp and to allow the servants of the Omnissiah to inspect and heal the voidship's wounds in the dock. The prayers and rituals will take some time, which our {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} Choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your protectorate — Dargonus, Janus, and Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: “怒焰星系是{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的所在地。这里是整个科罗努斯星域中，帝国唯一还在正常运转的前哨站。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}恳请您怜悯那些在亚空间中遭到损耗的机器，希望您允许欧姆尼塞亚的仆人在这里治疗虚空舰的伤口。他们的祈祷仪式需要耗费几天时间。在这段时间里，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语唱诗班{/g}会负责联系您麾下的主要世界：达戈努斯、加努斯，以及基亚瓦伽马星，与这些世界之间建立联系。”

languages.text: 「フュリバンダス星系は{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の本拠地です。コロヌス・エクスパンスでは、フットフォールが稼働中の埠頭がある唯一の帝国開拓地となっています。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}たちが、歪みで疲弊した機械に情けをかけて、万機神の使いにドックでヴォイドシップを点検させ、傷を治すことを許可してほしいと一生懸命頼み込んでいます。祈りと儀式には時間がかかりますが、その間に{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信{/g}聖歌隊が、保護領の主要惑星であるダルゴナス、ヤヌス、キアヴァ・ガンマとの連絡を確立できるのです」
languages.original_text: "The Furibundus System is home to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the warp and to allow the servants of the Omnissiah to inspect and heal the voidship's wounds in the dock. The prayers and rituals will take some time, which our {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} Choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your protectorate — Dargonus, Janus, and Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: 「フュリバンダス星系は{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の本拠地です。コロヌス・エクスパンスでは、フットフォールが稼働中の埠頭がある唯一の帝国開拓地となっています。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}たちが、歪みで疲弊した機械に情けをかけて、万機神の使いにドックでヴォイドシップを点検させ、傷を治すことを許可してほしいと一生懸命頼み込んでいます。祈りと儀式には時間がかかりますが、その間に{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信{/g}聖歌隊が、保護領の主要惑星であるダルゴナス、ヤヌス、キアヴァ・ガンマとの連絡を確立できるのです」

languages.text: "Im Furibundus-System befindet sich {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} – der einzige Außenposten des Imperiums in der Koronus-Ausdehnung mit einem funktionierenden Landeplatz. Die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} flehen Euch an, Erbarmen mit den vom Warp erschöpften Maschinen zu haben und den Dienern des Omnissiah zu gestatten, die Wunden des Raumschiffs im Dock zu inspizieren und zu heilen. Die Gebete und Rituale werden etwas Zeit in Anspruch nehmen, die unser {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathischer{/g} Chor dazu nutzen wird, Verbindung mit den Primärwelten Eures Protektorats aufzunehmen – Dargonus, Janus und Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "The Furibundus System is home to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the warp and to allow the servants of the Omnissiah to inspect and heal the voidship's wounds in the dock. The prayers and rituals will take some time, which our {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} Choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your protectorate — Dargonus, Janus, and Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Im Furibundus-System befindet sich {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} – der einzige Außenposten des Imperiums in der Koronus-Ausdehnung mit einem funktionierenden Landeplatz. Die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} flehen Euch an, Erbarmen mit den vom Warp erschöpften Maschinen zu haben und den Dienern des Omnissiah zu gestatten, die Wunden des Raumschiffs im Dock zu heilen. Die Gebete und Rituale werden einige Tage in Anspruch nehmen, die unser {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathischer{/g} Chor dazu nutzen wird, Verbindung mit den Primärwelten Eures Protektorats aufzunehmen – Dargonus, Janus und Kiava Gamma."

languages.text: « Le système de Furibundus abrite {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, le seul avant-poste de l'Imperium doté d'un port fonctionnel dans les Étendues de Koronus. Les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} vous implorent d'avoir pitié des machines épuisées par le Warp et de permettre aux serviteurs de l'Omnimessie d'examiner et de soigner les blessures du vaisseau à quai. Les prières et les rituels prendront un certain temps. Notre chœur {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathique{/g} en profitera donc pour prendre contact avec les mondes principaux de votre protectorat : Dargonus, Janus et Kiava Gamma. »
languages.original_text: "The Furibundus System is home to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the warp and to allow the servants of the Omnissiah to inspect and heal the voidship's wounds in the dock. The prayers and rituals will take some time, which our {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} Choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your protectorate — Dargonus, Janus, and Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: « Le système de Furibundus abrite {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, le seul avant-poste de l'Imperium doté d'un port fonctionnel dans les Étendues de Koronus. Les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} vous implorent d'avoir pitié des machines épuisées par le Warp et de permettre aux serviteurs de l'Omnimessie de soigner les blessures du vaisseau à quai. Les prières et les rituels dureront quelques jours, dont notre chœur {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathique{/g} profitera pour prendre contact avec les mondes principaux de votre protectorat : Dargonus, Janus et Kiava Gamma. »

languages.text: "Furibundus Sistemi, Koronus Enginliği'nde işlevsel bir rıhtıma sahip tek İmparatorluk karakolu olan {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'a{/g} ev sahipliği yapar. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g} size, öteboyut sebebiyle yıpranan makinelere merhamet etmeniz ve Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının limanda uçsuz gemisinin yaralarını inceleyip iyileştirmesine müsaade etmeniz için yalvarıyor. Dualar ve ayinlerin tamamlanması zaman alacak, {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropatik{/g} Koromuz da bu süreden faydalanarak protektoranızın baş dünyaları Dargonus, Janus ve Kiava Gama ile bağlantı kuracak."
languages.original_text: "The Furibundus System is home to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} — the only Imperium outpost with a functioning wharf in the Koronus Expanse. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are begging you to have mercy on the machines worn down by the warp and to allow the servants of the Omnissiah to inspect and heal the voidship's wounds in the dock. The prayers and rituals will take some time, which our {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} Choir will use to establish a connection with the prime worlds of your protectorate — Dargonus, Janus, and Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'a ev sahipliği yapan Furibundus Sistemi, Koronus Enginliği'nde işlevsel bir rıhtıma sahip tek İmparatorluk karakolu. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g} size, öteboyut sebebiyle yıpranan makinelere merhamet etmeniz ve Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının rıhtımda uçsuz gemisinin yaralarını inceleyip iyileştirmesine müsaade etmeniz için yalvarıyorlar. Dualar ve ayinler biraz zaman alacak ve {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropatik{/g} Koro'muz bu süreden faydalanarak protektoranızdaki Dargonus, Janus ve Kiava Gama dünyaları ile bağlantı kurmaya çalışacak."
